metadata.input: {"input":"{\"file_path\":\"quick_sort.js\",\"content\":\"function quickSort(arr) {\\n  if (arr.length <= 1) {\\n    return arr;\\n  }\\n  const pivot = arr[Math.floor(arr.length / 2)];\\n  const left = [];\\n  const right = [];\\n  const equal = [];\\n  for (const element of arr) {\\n    if (element < pivot) {\\n      left.push(element);\\n    } else if (element > pivot) {\\n      right.push(element);\\n    } else {\\n      equal.push(element);\\n    }\\n  }\\n  return [...quickSort(left), ...equal, ...quickSort(right)];\\n}\\n\\nmodule.exports = quickSort;\",\"create_directories\":true}"}

{"input":"{\"file_path\":\"quick_sort.test.js\",\"content\":\"const quickSort = require('./quick_sort');\\n\\ntest('sorts an empty array', () => {\\n  expect(quickSort([])).toEqual([]);\\n});\\n\\ntest('sorts an array with one element', () => {\\n  expect(quickSort([5])).toEqual([5]);\\n});\\n\\ntest('sorts an array with multiple elements', () => {\\n  expect(quickSort([3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 9, 2, 6])).toEqual([1, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9]);\\n});\\n\\ntest('sorts a reverse-sorted array', () => {\\n  expect(quickSort([9, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1])).toEqual([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9]);\\n});\\n\\ntest('sorts an array with duplicate elements', () => {\\n  expect(quickSort([5, 3, 8, 5, 2, 5])).toEqual([2, 3, 5, 5, 5, 8]);\\n});\",\"create_directories\":true}"}
